author: aaron
msg: Add some more comments and more robust error checking.
Changed the return error from apr_shm_attach if filename == NULL. Normally
in APR input parameters are not explicitly checked, but since in apr_shm
a NULL filename has a special meaning (anonymous memory) it will now

author: aaron
msg: AIX does not define MAP_FAILED, but it's just a (void *)-1.
Reviewed by:	Sander Striker <striker@apache.org>, Aaron Bannert

author: trawick
msg: fix a typo in a comment
